Constructor Detail

Number

public Number(int val,
              info.gridworld.grid.Location loc,
              int t)
Constructs a number.

Parameters:
val - the value for this number (0-9). 0 is a special value meanging that this cell has not had a value chosen.
loc - the location for this number.
t - the type of this object. Possible values are Number.ORIGINAL, Number.PLAYER, and Number.CHEAT.
Method Detail

the text string.

getType

public int getType()
Gets the type of the number.

Returns:
the type.

getTextColor

public java.awt.Color getTextColor()
Gets the color used to display the number in the grid. The color depends on the type:
ORIGINAL values are colored BLACK
PLAYER values are colored BLUE
CHEAT values are colored RED

Returns:
the color for the text

getColor

public java.awt.Color getColor()
Gets the background color for the number. This color is based on a alternating 3x3 boxes. Boxes are colored GRAY or WHITE with the upper left box being WHITE.

Returns:
the background color
